rooms.description: An open-plan area combining the living room and modern Scandinavian kitchen. The space is designed with minimalistic aesthetics using natural wood, white walls and neutral tones. Vastu principles have been integrated by placing the main entrance in the east, aligning with positive energy flow. Abundant natural light and functional storage solutions are prioritized.

A large bedroom that maintains a Scandinavian design aesthetic through clean lines and subtle textures. It is positioned towards the north to encourage relaxation, as per Vastu guidelines. The room includes an en-suite bathroom with a compact design.
A secondary bedroom designed for occasional guests, featuring Scandinavian simplicity and functional furniture. Ideally placed on the west side to balance energy according to local building norms.
Additional bathroom space ensuring convenient access from both master and guest bedrooms. Designed with moisture-resistant materials and modern fixtures.
